overview: "A Bribe From The Boss" - Juelz's boss has been hitting on her for a long time. He finally apologizes and makes her an offer she can't refuse. $100,000 to fuck him. It's a good day at the office.  "Handling a Big Load of Stress" - While working late, Vanilla decides to take a nap on her couch. Just as she falls asl--p, the janitor comes in and wakes her up. She makes him pay by fucking her nice and hard.  "Powerless Titties" - Rachel's company has hired a guy to find ways to cut costs. He determines that Rachel's job can be cut. She uses her big tits to help change his mind.  "The Diner Down the Road" - Alanah is a waitress in a crappy diner and money is tight. When a customer offers her a big tip for some extra special service she and her big tits can't decline.  "Dirty Boss Caught!" - Madelyn's boss needs her help. She dresses slutty and comes on to the company owner in order to get the dirt on the sex-crazed-asshole of an executive.
title: Big Tits At Work 12
